magmaphile.midnightconfig.title: Magmaphile
magmaphile.midnightconfig.override_lava_:
Toggles this mod's functionality.
Off for vanilla, On for custom parameters.
magmaphile.midnightconfig.toggle_lower_b:
Allows configuring a lower limit for lava pool generation.

§l(§4§l*§r§l) §4§lThis feature is experimental.
magmaphile.midnightconfig.lava_max_heigh:
Higher boundary for the height at which lava pools generate underground.

This value should be §lhigher§r than §lUnderground Lava Height Generation (End)
magmaphile.midnightconfig.lava_min_heigh:
Lower boundary for the height at which lava pools generate underground.

This value should be §llower§r than §lUnderground Lava Height Generation (Start)

§l(§4§l*§r§l) §4§lThis feature is experimental.
